title: Tech Talk 2025: AI & Machine Learning
description: Join industry experts as they discuss the latest trends in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. Learn about real-world applications, career opportunities, and the future of technology.

title: Annual Cultural Fest
description: A celebration of art, music, dance, and traditions from around the world. Featuring live performances, food stalls, and cultural exhibitions. Open to all students and staff.

title: Inter-College Sports Day
description: Compete with students from other colleges in cricket, basketball, badminton, volleyball, and athletics. Show your athletic spirit and earn points for your college!

title: Web Development Workshop
description: Learn modern web development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Hands-on session covering responsive design, frameworks, and deployment. Suitable for beginners and intermediate level.

title: Campus Talent Hunt
description: Showcase your talent! Categories include singing, dancing, comedy, and instrumental music. Cash prizes and certificates for winners. Registration closes on November 18.

title: Business Case Competition
description: Compete with peers to solve real business problems. Teams of 4 members will analyze case studies and present solutions. Mentorship from industry professionals included.

title: Fresher's Welcome Party
description: Welcome new students to campus! Meet your batchmates, enjoy games, music, and food. Fun activities and prizes throughout the evening. Dress code: Casual.

title: Debate Championship
description: Participate in thought-provoking debates on contemporary issues. Topics will be announced on the day. Open to all students. Prizes for best speaker and best team.

title: Annual Marathon
description: Join the campus-wide marathon event. Route: 5km around campus. Early morning start with refreshments at checkpoints. T-shirts and medals for all participants.

title: Entrepreneurship Summit
description: Learn from successful entrepreneurs and startup founders about building businesses from scratch. Sessions on funding, marketing, and scaling. Networking opportunities included.
